title: Happiness and the Art of Being - Canadian publication now released
content:
Yesterday evening the Canadian publication of Happiness and the Art of Being - A Layman's Introduction to the Philosophy and Practice of the Spiritual Teachings of Bhagavan Sri Ramana was released, and it is now available for purchase on the publisher's website at:

www.trafford.com/07-0799

At present this webpage gives only minimum information about the book, but within the next few days more detailed information will be added to it.

Within four to six weeks this book will also be listed in Amazon.com, and subsequently it will be listed on other Amazon sites such as Amazon.co.uk, on the sites of other online book retailers such as Abebooks.com, BarnesandNoble.com and Borders.com, and reference catalogues used by offline bookstores such as Bowkerâ€™s BooksInPrint, Nielsen BookData and Ingram's Active Titles Database.
